Description:
Responsibilities:Carry all roads design activities for projects and studies in various development stages: pre-feasibility, feasibility, concept design, basic design, detailed design and permitting.
Design of grade-separated interchanges and complex interchanges.
Design of junctions of roundabouts and signalized junctions both horizontally and vertically and the development of site grading.
Design the Roads in a 3D environment.
Design of road cross-sections and generating earthwork quantities from the 3D model.
Pavements design and pavement design reports.
Work coactively with the design team, and collaborate closely with other disciplines ensuring their requirements are fulfilled.
Provide design support during the construction stage.
Attend team and project meetings.
Cascade information to the team as required.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering – Roads
5-8 years of relevant roads design experience
Strong knowledge of Authorities’ regulations in UAE and international standards
Knowledge in Geometric design of roads and highways (horizontal alignments, vertical alignments, cross-sections, signing and marking) according to local and international standards (AASHTO, etc.)
Ability to explain design ideas and plans clearly
Revit, Civil 3D proficiency
Excellent communication skills
Immediate availability is preferred
